key_points: Gabby Petito's disappearance sparked widespread public interest and amateur detective work on social media.
Two YouTubers played a crucial role in leading authorities to Petito’s van.
A couple on TikTok claimed they picked up Brian Laundrie, Petito’s boyfriend, hitchhiking.
Petito's body was found in Bridger-Teton National Forest.
Social media users have been actively trying to solve the mystery behind Petito's death.
Retired NYPD Detective Michael Alcazar highlighted the benefit of having millions of 'civilian investigators'.
The FBI executed a search warrant at Brian Laundrie's Florida home.
The search and investigation into Gabby Petito's death are active and ongoing.
YouTubers Jenn and Kyle Bethune provided potentially critical footage of Petito’s van.
A TikTok user claims to have given Laundrie a ride, which could provide important clues.
